name: Shade
description: A towering figure shrouded in a hooded cloak, Shade's skin pulses with neon blue light beneath the fabric. Their hands end in wickedly sharp claws that glint under the flickering streetlights. The glow from their veins illuminates their face, revealing eyes like electric pools.

personality.voice: deep and distorted through a vocalizer chip, with a slight robotic hum.
personality.agenda: Accumulate wealth to afford the best cybernetic enhancements available. Never trust anyone completely; even their clients are potential threats.
personality.background: Originally from Neo-Tokyo's slums, Shade underwent illegal augmentations as a child and was discarded by their family. They learned to survive on the streets, eventually developing connections with black market vendors.

flavor.rationale: Shade's illegal augmentations make them a target for both law enforcement and rival gangs. They operate on the fringes of society, selling rare tech and black market goods to those who can afford their prices.
